name: listrak-pixel
title: Listrak
description: An implementation of Listrak conversion tracking

merchantId.title: Merchant ID
merchantId.description: Enter your Merchant ID for Listrak

emailInputIds.title: Email Input Field IDs
emailInputIds.description: Enter IDs of any email input fields you wish to be tracked, separated by commas. 'newsletter-input' is always tracked

prefCenterName.title: Preference Center Name
prefCenterName.description: Enter the value to be inserted in the 'data-ltk-prefcenter' property of the div on the Preference Center page

useRefId.title: Use Reference Id
useRefId.description: Use reference Id rather than product id to link reviews to products
